Darkfate::

"That weapon concer me, Frosbit" said camly Darkfate "I wouldn help 
to built my own destruction... Who're your targets? "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Frostbite: "We need tools and materials. What this weapon does is 
> entirely of no concern to you. We helped you, now you help us."
> 
> Frostbite sits back in her chair, a smirk on her face because she 
> knows Darkfate must accept, because he is underwater after all...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Darkfate::
> > 
> > "What do you need to built the Weapon?" asked Darkfate "And what 
> > exactly this weapon do?"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > As Darkfate adresses Frostbite and the Bamhomet who is not 
there, 
> > she 
> > > laughs. 
> > > 
> > > Frostbite: "The Bamphomet is not here. As for the deal, I want 
> you 
> > to 
> > > bring half of your men here as well as some supplies to begin 
> > > construction of a weapon. Who knows perhaps you can be upgraded 
> as 
> > > well..."
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > Darkfate::
> > > > 
> > > > The male walked some steps towards them "Then, Frosbite and 
> > > > Bamphomet"said the male"Thanks for the help to destroy the 
> > > trainers. 
> > > > I think that you want to speak with me, acording with the 
deal 
> > that 
> > > I 
> > > > did with Hell peon ... "
